citation: Proclamation under the Construction Industry (Long Service) Act 1997 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Construction Industry (Long Service) Act 1997

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Construction Industry (Long Service) Act 1997 fix 1 July 1998 as the day on which that Act commences.

19 June 1998

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

R. J. GROOM

Minister for Workplace Standards

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 24 June 1998

This proclamation is administered by the Workplace Standards Authority.
